sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a new user defined backup policy.

Inputs :

  • Tenancy ID - OCID of the tenancy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to. Example: us-ashburn-1.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Schedules - List of objects containing these values
    • Backup Type - he type of volume backup to create.
    • Period - The volume backup frequency.
    • Retention Seconds - How long, in seconds, to keep the volume backups created by this schedule.
    • Period - The volume backup frequency.
    • Offset Type - Indicates how the offset is defined. If value is STRUCTURED, then hourOfDay, dayOfWeek, dayOfMonth, and month fields are used and offsetSeconds will be ignored in requests and users should ignore its value from the responses.
    • Time Zone - Specifies what time zone is the schedule in.
    • Hour Of Day - The hour of the day to schedule the volume backup.
    • Day Of Week - The day of the week to schedule the volume backup.
    • Month - The month of the year to schedule the volume backup.
    • Day Of Month - The day of the month to schedule the volume backup.
    • Offset Seconds - The number of seconds that the volume backup start time should be shifted from the default interval boundaries specified by the period.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to "Success". If there is a failure, Status is set to "Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Volume Backup Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the volume.
  • Time Created - Date and time the volume backup policy was created.
  • Lifecycle State - Current state of the volume backup policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to.
  • Defined Tags - Defined tags for this resource.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • schedules - Complex object containing the details of the schedule.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a new user defined backup policy.

Inputs :

  • Tenancy ID - OCID of the tenancy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to. Example: us-ashburn-1.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Schedules - List of objects containing these values
    • Backup Type - he type of volume backup to create.
    • Period - The volume backup frequency.
    • Retention Seconds - How long, in seconds, to keep the volume backups created by this schedule.
    • Period - The volume backup frequency.
    • Offset Type - Indicates how the offset is defined. If value is STRUCTURED, then hourOfDay, dayOfWeek, dayOfMonth, and month fields are used and offsetSeconds will be ignored in requests and users should ignore its value from the responses.
    • Time Zone - Specifies what time zone is the schedule in.
    • Hour Of Day - The hour of the day to schedule the volume backup.
    • Day Of Week - The day of the week to schedule the volume backup.
    • Month - The month of the year to schedule the volume backup.
    • Day Of Month - The day of the month to schedule the volume backup.
    • Offset Seconds - The number of seconds that the volume backup start time should be shifted from the default interval boundaries specified by the period.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to "Success". If there is a failure, Status is set to "Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Volume Backup Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the volume.
  • Time Created - Date and time the volume backup policy was created.
  • Lifecycle State - Current state of the volume backup policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to.
  • Defined Tags - Defined tags for this resource.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • schedules - Complex object containing the details of the schedule.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
